library(kableExtra)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)

workshops <- googlesheets4::read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1C3YARs0diRMo2FF0VguO1B8uPByP7lNCkxLym-APV_0/edit?usp=sharing") # Request access from Sam to update this sheet

```{r, echo = FALSE}
##############################
# add links
##############################

workshops[1,5] <- cell_spec("link",  "html", link = "https://ucsb-meds.github.io/customizing-websites-css/#1")
workshops[1,6] <- cell_spec("link",  "html", link = "https://github.com/UCSB-MEDS/customizing-websites-css")

##############################
# build table 
##############################

workshops %>% 
  kable(col.names = c("Date", "Workshop title", "Description", "Approximate duration", "Presentation materials", "GitHub repo"), format = "html", escape = FALSE) %>% 
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped") %>% 
  kableExtra::row_spec(1, extra_css = "border-bottom: 1px solid gainsboro") %>% 
  scroll_box(width = "100%", height = "200px") 
```
